title: BRIEF-Canada Carbon To Pursue Legal Action
text: February 26, 2018 / 4:33 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Canada Carbon To Pursue Legal Action Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Canada Carbon Inc: * CANADA CARBON TO PURSUE LEGAL ACTION * CANADA CARBON - IS IN PROCESS OF FILING LAWSUIT AGAINST GRENVILLE-SUR-LA-ROUGE, ITS COUNCILORS TO ANNUL RESOLUTION OF NON-COMPLIANCE ADOPTED ON DEC 12 * CANADA CARBON - CO RECEIVED LETTER FROM QUÉBEC‘S AGRICULTURAL BOARD CPTAQ CONFIRMING ITS DECISION TO ADMINISTRATIVELY CLOSE JAN 25 CLOSURE * CANADA CARBON SAYS‍ DID NOT GET A RESPONSE TO ITS LETTER TO MAYOR OF GRENVILLE-SUR-LA-ROUGE DATED DEC 15 , 2017​ * CANADA CARBON - CO IS FILING LAWSUIT AGAINST GSLR TO DECLARE CO CRYSTALLIZED RIGHT TO MINING AND MARBLE QUARRY WHEN FILED REQUEST BEFORE CPTAQ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
